short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly look up poker hand rankings and values for better strategy and gameplay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily explore poker hand rankings with this intuitive and interactive tool, designed to help players of all skill levels make better decisions during gameplay.

Features include:
- Hand Lookup: Search for specific hands, including suited (s), off-suited (o), and pairs, with results displayed instantly.
- Visual Insights: Hands are color-coded based on their value, with a progress bar for quick interpretation.
- Custom Icons: Easily differentiate between pairs, suited, and off-suited hands using visually distinct icons.
- Responsive Design: Optimized for both desktop and mobile browsers, ensuring accessibility everywhere.
- Scrollable Table: Always visible, easy-to-read rankings with smooth scrolling for large data sets.
- Interactive Modals: Get additional insights with just a click using integrated info panels.
- Whether you’re a beginner learning the ropes or a seasoned pro fine-tuning your strategy, this extension offers the tools you need to stay ahead at the table.

Start improving your poker game today—download now and gain the edge you need to win!
